mapper.select: select id, name, growth_point, default_status, free_freight_point, comment_growth_point, priviledge_free_freight, priviledge_member_price, priviledge_birthday, note from ums_member_level where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ums_member_level(name, growth_point, default_status, free_freight_point, comment_growth_point, priviledge_free_freight, priviledge_member_price, priviledge_birthday, note) values (#{name}, #{growthPoint}, #{defaultStatus}, #{freeFreightPoint}, #{commentGrowthPoint}, #{priviledgeFreeFreight}, #{priviledgeMemberPrice}, #{priviledgeBirthday}, #{note})

insert into ums_member_level(name, growth_point, default_status, free_freight_point, comment_growth_point, priviledge_free_freight, priviledge_member_price, priviledge_birthday, note) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.growthPoint}, #{entity.defaultStatus}, #{entity.freeFreightPoint}, #{entity.commentGrowthPoint}, #{entity.priviledgeFreeFreight}, #{entity.priviledgeMemberPrice}, #{entity.priviledgeBirthday}, #{entity.note})

insert into ums_member_level(name, growth_point, default_status, free_freight_point, comment_growth_point, priviledge_free_freight, priviledge_member_price, priviledge_birthday, note) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.growthPoint}, #{entity.defaultStatus}, #{entity.freeFreightPoint}, #{entity.commentGrowthPoint}, #{entity.priviledgeFreeFreight}, #{entity.priviledgeMemberPrice}, #{entity.priviledgeBirthday}, #{entity.note})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), growth_point = values(growth_point), default_status = values(default_status), free_freight_point = values(free_freight_point), comment_growth_point = values(comment_growth_point), priviledge_free_freight = values(priviledge_free_freight), priviledge_member_price = values(priviledge_member_price), priviledge_birthday = values(priviledge_birthday), note = values(note)
mapper.update:
update ums_member_level
name = #{name},
growth_point = #{growthPoint},
default_status = #{defaultStatus},
free_freight_point = #{freeFreightPoint},
comment_growth_point = #{commentGrowthPoint},
priviledge_free_freight = #{priviledgeFreeFreight},
priviledge_member_price = #{priviledgeMemberPrice},
priviledge_birthday = #{priviledgeBirthday},
note = #{note},
where id = #{id}
